title: Curried Shrimp and Cauliflower
directions: Heat oil in a large skillet heat oil over medium high. Add onion, garlic, and ginger and saute until onion is translucent, about 3 minutes. Add curry powder and 1/2 teaspoon salt and saute for 30 seconds. Stir in cauliflower and stock, and bring to a boil. Cover and cook until cauliflower is just tender, about 5 minutes. Add shrimp, cover, and cook until shrimp are opaque throughout, 2 to 3 minutes, taste and adjust for seasoning.
ingredients: PREP: 12 MINS TOTAL TIME: 25 MINS SERVINGS: 4
